title: Save up to $200 on Apple's M4 14-inch & 16-inch MacBook Pro
description: Apple's brand-new MacBook Pro is eligible for exclusive coupon savings, with triple-digit discounts on a variety of M4, M4 Pro and M4 Max models from the 14-inch and 16-inch lines.Save on Apple's brand-new M4 MacBook Pro - Image credit: AppleAppleInsider readers can be first in line to snag discounts on Apple's brand-new M4 MacBook Pro that was announced on Oct. 30. With promo code APINSIDER, shoppers can save $100 to $200 on both 14-inch and 16-inch M4 models. Continue Reading on AppleInsider | Discuss on our Forums
author: Christine McKee
excerpt: Apple's brand-new MacBook Pro is eligible for exclusive coupon savings, with triple-digit discounts on a variety of M4, M4 Pro and M4 Max models from the 14-inch and 16-inch lines.
text: Save on Apple's brand-new M4 MacBook Pro - Image credit: Apple Apple's brand-new MacBook Pro is eligible for exclusive coupon savings, with triple-digit discounts on a variety of M4, M4 Pro and M4 Max models from the 14-inch and 16-inch lines. Save on the 2024 M4 MacBook Pro The coupon works on all retail M4 configurations, with a breakdown of the deals below: New 14-inch models M4, 16GB RAM, 512GB, Standard Glass: $1,499* ($100 off) M4, 16GB RAM, 1TB: $1,699* ($100 off) M4, 24GB RAM, 1TB: $1,899* ($100 off) M4 Pro, 12C CPU, 16C GPU, 24GB RAM, 512GB, Standard Glass: $1,899* ($100 off) M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 24GB RAM, 1TB, Standard Glass: $2,299* ($100 off ) M4 Max, 14C CPU, 32C GPU, 36GB RAM, 1TB, Standard Glass: $2,999* ($200 off) *Price with coupon code APINSIDER. New 16-inch models M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 24GB RAM, 512GB, Standard Glass: $2,399* ($100 off ) M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 48GB RAM, 512GB, Standard Glass: $2,699* ($200 off) M4 Max, 14C CPU, 32C GPU, 36GB RAM, 1TB, Standard Glass: $3,299* ($200 off) M4 Max, 16C CPU, 40C GPU, 48GB RAM, 1TB, Standard Glass: $3,799* ($200 off) *Price with promo code APINSIDER. How to apply the M4 MacBook Pro couponTo locate the coupon code field at Adorama, proceed through normal checkout using the orange button and look for a link that says "Do you have a gift card or promo code?". Click that and enter APINSIDER in the box. Here are step-by-step activation instructions: Add a qualifying Mac to your Adorama shopping cart. Proceed to checkout. When you get to step 4 (Payment), look for a link with a gift icon that says: "Do you have a gift card or promo code?" Click that link to bring up the promo code field and enter APINSIDER. Here's what the process looks like: Enter promo code APINSIDER during Step 4 of checkout. That's it! You should see the promo code discount reflected in your order total. For even more MacBook Pro deals, be sure to check out our Apple Price Guide.
html:
Save on Apple's brand-new M4 MacBook Pro - Image credit: Apple

Apple's brand-new MacBook Pro is eligible for exclusive coupon savings, with triple-digit discounts on a variety of M4, M4 Pro and M4 Max models from the 14-inch and 16-inch lines.

Save on the 2024 M4 MacBook Pro

The coupon works on all retail M4 configurations, with a breakdown of the deals below:

New 14-inch models

  • M4, 16GB RAM, 512GB, Standard Glass: $1,499* ($100 off)
  • M4, 16GB RAM, 1TB: $1,699* ($100 off)
  • M4, 24GB RAM, 1TB: $1,899* ($100 off)
  • M4 Pro, 12C CPU, 16C GPU, 24GB RAM, 512GB, Standard Glass: $1,899* ($100 off)
  • M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 24GB RAM, 1TB, Standard Glass: $2,299* ($100 off )
  • M4 Max, 14C CPU, 32C GPU, 36GB RAM, 1TB, Standard Glass: $2,999* ($200 off)
    • *Price with coupon code APINSIDER.

New 16-inch models

  • M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 24GB RAM, 512GB, Standard Glass: $2,399* ($100 off )
  • M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 48GB RAM, 512GB, Standard Glass: $2,699* ($200 off)
  • M4 Max, 14C CPU, 32C GPU, 36GB RAM, 1TB, Standard Glass: $3,299* ($200 off)
  • M4 Max, 16C CPU, 40C GPU, 48GB RAM, 1TB, Standard Glass: $3,799* ($200 off)
    • *Price with promo code APINSIDER.

How to apply the M4 MacBook Pro coupon

To locate the coupon code field at Adorama, proceed through normal checkout using the orange button and look for a link that says "Do you have a gift card or promo code?". Click that and enter APINSIDER in the box. Here are step-by-step activation instructions:

  1. Add a qualifying Mac to your Adorama shopping cart.
  2. Proceed to checkout. When you get to step 4 (Payment), look for a link with a gift icon that says: "Do you have a gift card or promo code?"
  3. Click that link to bring up the promo code field and enter APINSIDER. Here's what the process looks like:

Enter promo code APINSIDER during Step 4 of checkout.

That's it! You should see the promo code discount reflected in your order total. For even more MacBook Pro deals, be sure to check out our Apple Price Guide.
